meanings.definition: A person who installs or repairs electrical wiring.
meanings.sent1: The wirers came to fix the lights in our house.
meanings.sent2: The wirers in our neighborhood are very skilled at their job.
meanings.sent3: The wirers joked that they could wire a house blindfolded!
meanings.sent4: The wirers' hands moved like lightning as they fixed the wiring issue.
meanings.sent5: I watched in amazement as the wirers transformed the old building with new wiring.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'wirer', referring to multiple individuals who install or repair electrical wiring.
meanings.sent1: We hired wirers to update the electrical system in our office.
meanings.sent2: The wirers arrived early in the morning to start their work.
meanings.sent3: The wirers shared stories of their most challenging wiring projects.
meanings.sent4: The wirers worked together like a well-oiled machine to complete the job.
meanings.sent5: The wirers' dedication to their craft was evident in the quality of their work.
